name: Ultimate Turbo
description:
I wanted to make a rocket league-like controlled  car and this is the prototype so far.

Gamepad or Keyboard controls Available (use Alt+Escape to Minimize Window and then right click it to close the game, sorry ^·^)

-Keyboard -

WASD: Accelerate and Turn // Arrow keys: Tilt car while in the air // Space: Jump // Shift: Turbo! // R: Restart 

-360 Controller-

RT LT: Accelerate // Left Stick: Turn // A: Jump // B: Turbo! // X(Modifier): Tilt with Left Stick

ENJOY ^__^
